fullplot: A dramatic history of Pu Yi, the last of the Emperors of China, from his lofty birth and brief reign in the Forbidden City, the object of worship by half a billion people; through his abdication, his decline and dissolute lifestyle; his exploitation by the invading Japanese, and finally to his obscure existence as just another peasant worker in the People's Republic.
plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.
title: The Last Emperor

tomatoes.consensus: While decidedly imperfect, Bernardo Bertolucci's epic is still a feast for the eyes.
